amendment.description: Amendment sought to restrict the application of the bill if a major disaster had been declared in the area due to flooding within the last five years, or the waters in question had contributed to such a declaration.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 112-144 to restrict the application of the bill if a major disaster had been declared in the area due to flooding within the last five years, or the waters in question had contributed to such a declaration.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Carnahan amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 247 (Roll no. 570).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Carnahan.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Carnahan amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 247 (Roll no. 570).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
